meanings.definition: An organized body of people with a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The school organization planned a fun event for the students.
meanings.sent2: The non-profit organization helps homeless animals find loving homes.
meanings.sent3: The organization of squirrels decided to have a nut-gathering competition.
meanings.sent4: The organization of ants working together was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The organization of volunteers made the beach cleanup efficient and successful.

meanings.sent1: Her organization of the files made it easy to find important documents.
meanings.sent2: The organization of the event took a lot of time and effort.
meanings.sent3: His organization of toys by color made the room look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The organization of the books on the shelf was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The organization of the schedule ensured that everything ran smoothly.

meanings.definition: The structure or arrangement of something.
meanings.sent1: The organization of the paragraphs in the essay was clear and logical.
meanings.sent2: The organization of the flowers in the garden created a beautiful display.
meanings.sent3: The organization of the fruit in the bowl made it look like a piece of art.
meanings.sent4: The organization of the furniture in the room maximized the space.
meanings.sent5: The organization of the ingredients on the counter made cooking a breeze.
